definition: to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: The sky glowed Saturday and a thin dusting of sand covered Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京周六天空灰蒙蒙的，到处是薄薄的扬沙尘土。

sentences.english: He could not see out of the foggy window.
sentences.chinese: 他不能从这雾蒙蒙的窗户看出去。

sentences.english: Both of the window screens were ashy, you would feel dim when looked out of window.
sentences.chinese: 两个窗纱也灰蒙蒙的，从宿舍向外看朦朦胧胧的感觉。

sentences.english: Storm clouds coming in, backlit by the sun. A light drizzle begins.
sentences.chinese: 乱云逼近，阳光从乌云背后透过来，小雨开始蒙蒙。

sentences.english: Drizzle stole over the small village.
sentences.chinese: 蒙蒙细雨悄悄笼罩了那座小村庄。

sentences.english: A grey sky, the test on the red Numbers, chilly wind.
sentences.chinese: 灰蒙蒙的天空，考试上鲜红的数字，清冷的风。

sentences.english: Keeping company the hazy lemon Moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 陪伴著柠檬月色迷迷蒙蒙。

sentences.english: Where one could look out through the wet window at the starry night .
sentences.chinese: 从那里透过水汽蒙蒙的玻璃可以望到外面的星夜。

sentences.english: In this weather the cliff face was a foggy drop into infinity .
sentences.chinese: 在这种天气条件下，雾蒙蒙的悬崖隐入广漠无限之中。
那时天空变得灰蒙蒙的。

sentences.english: The snow with mist used throughout the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 白蒙蒙的雪雾笼罩着整个山脉。

sentences.english: Rain misty rainy night, under the street light smoke.
sentences.chinese: 细雨蒙蒙的雨夜，烟雾弥漫在路灯下。

sentences.english: It is always raining, or about to rain, in the mountainous city;
sentences.chinese: 这座山城时常下雨，要么就是雨雾蒙蒙。

sentences.english: I love Paris in the winter, when it drizzles.
sentences.chinese: 我爱冬日蒙蒙细雨中的巴黎。

sentences.english: It was a cold, drizzly day.
sentences.chinese: 这是冷而下着蒙蒙细雨天。

sentences.english: This section of the country is drizzly in the winter.
sentences.chinese: 该国的这一地区在冬天经常细雨蒙蒙。

definition: (of mist, snow, floodwater etc) a vast expanse of whiteness
multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
